statements: SELECT * FROM models;
SELECT model_name, model_height FROM models WHERE model_age > 30;
SELECT model_name FROM models WHERE model_height BETWEEN 170.0 AND 180.0;
SELECT * FROM models ORDER BY model_age DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_height FROM models ORDER BY model_height ASC, model_age DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_age FROM models WHERE model_height > 170 ORDER BY model_age DESC
SELECT model_name, model_height FROM models WHERE model_age < 30 ORDER BY model_height ASC
SELECT * FROM models WHERE model_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY model_height DESC
SELECT model_name, model_age, model_height FROM models WHERE model_height < 180 AND model_age > 30 ORDER BY model_name ASC
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_age, model_height FROM models ORDER BY model_id DESC
SELECT * FROM models;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM models WHERE model_age > 30 ORDER BY model_age DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_gender FROM models WHERE model_gender = 'Female';
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM designers WHERE designer_specialty = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM models INNER JOIN designers ON models.model_id = designers.designer_id;
SELECT model_name, model_age FROM models WHERE model_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY model_age DESC;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM designers WHERE designer_specialty IN ('Fashion', 'Graphic Design') ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, model_age FROM models WHERE model_age > 25 AND model_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY model_age;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM designers WHERE designer_specialty = 'Interior Design' ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM models JOIN designers ON models.model_id = designers.designer_id ORDER BY model_name ASC, designer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM models;
SELECT name, age FROM models WHERE height > 170;
SELECT model_id, name FROM models WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT brand, name FROM designers WHERE brand='Gucci' OR brand='Prada';
SELECT * FROM fashion_shows WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM models WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, height FROM models WHERE height >= 170 AND age < 30 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM designers WHERE brand LIKE 'Gucci%' AND name <> 'John Doe';
SELECT model_id, name, age FROM models WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT show_name, location FROM fashion_shows WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT model_name, age, height FROM models;
SELECT designer_name, speciality, experience FROM designers ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM event_details WHERE location='Paris';
SELECT collection_name, year FROM collections WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT model_name, age, height FROM models WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM models ORDER BY model_name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, height, age FROM models WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, model_name ASC;
SELECT designer_name, speciality, experience FROM designers ORDER BY experience DESC, designer_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT collection_name, year, designer_id FROM collections WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY designer_id ASC, year DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM event_details ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_name DESC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM models;
SELECT model_name, age FROM models WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT model_name, agency FROM models WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM collections ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT collection_name, designer_id FROM collections WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM models
SELECT model_name, age FROM models ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT agency FROM models
SELECT designer_name, brand_name, nationality FROM designers JOIN collections ON designers.designer_id = collections.designer_id
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM events WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
